org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup

Class RSGroupAdmin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup.RSGroupAdmin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RSGroupAdminClient, RSGroupAdminServer

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public abstract class RSGroupAdmin
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Group user API interface used between client and server.

      • moveServers

        public abstract void moveServers(Set<com.google.common.net.HostAndPort> servers,
                                 String targetGroup)
                          throws IOException
        Move a set of serves to another group
        Parameters:
        servers - set of servers, must be in the form HOST:PORT
        targetGroup - the target group
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

      • moveTables

        public abstract void moveTables(Set<TableName> tables,
                                String targetGroup)
                         throws IOException
        Move tables to a new group. This will unassign all of a table's region so it can be reassigned to the correct group.
        Parameters:
        tables - list of tables to move
        targetGroup - target group
        Throws:
        IOException - on failure to move tables

        Parameters:
        name - name of the group
        Throws:
        IOException - on failure to add group

        Parameters:
        name - name of the group

        IOException - on failure to remove group

      • balanceRSGroup

        public abstract boolean balanceRSGroup(String name)
                                throws IOException
        Balance the regions in a group
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the group to balance
        Returns:
        boolean whether balance ran or not
        Throws:
        IOException - on unexpected failure to balance group

        Returns:
        Collection of RSGroupInfo.

      • getRSGroupOfServer

        public abstract RSGroupInfo getRSGroupOfServer(com.google.common.net.HostAndPort hostPort)
                                        throws IOException
        Retrieve the RSGroupInfo a server is affiliated to
        Parameters:
        hostPort - HostPort to get RSGroupInfo for
        Returns:
        RSGroupInfo associated with the server
        Throws:
        IOException - on unexpected failure to retrieve GroupInfo
